name: Switching Witching
description:
Switching Witching

A witch is causing trouble in town. She is switching the town peoples belongings and chaos ensues. Your job is to help return the right item to it's owner before they get really upset!

Can be played using keyboard or controller. Use arrows or stick to move, space/ctrl/z to switch items, and enter/option to pause the game. Push a button to start!

Works better when played in fullscreen!

Made by a team of two, almost all content created by us (using some sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com) for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.
